sendResetEmail.resetEmailMessage:
Hello!
We received a request to reset your password.

If you made this request, please follow the link below to reset your password:

{resetUrl}

If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.

Thanks!
sendResetEmail.cooldownError: Please wait {formattedTime} before requesting another reset email.

resetPassword.samePasswordError: New password cannot be the same as the old password

resetEmail.requestNotExistError: This email verification link is invalid or has expired.
resetEmail.someoneElseVerifyLinkError: Email change failed: This link can only be used by the user who requested it.

sendEmailVerification.emailVerificationMessageSubject: ASA | Verify Your New Email Address
sendEmailVerification.verifyEmailMessage:
Hello!
We received a request to update your email address.

If you made this request, please follow the link below to verify your new email:

{verificationUrl}

If you did not request this change, please ignore this email.

Thanks!

sendEmailProviderByApplicationId.applicationMessage:
Hello!

A new artist has responded to your opportunity

{url}

Thanks!

createOpportunityInvitesUnregistered.inviteMessageWithMaxAmount:
Hello!

You have been invited by the provider to implement the opportunity.
The provider is willing to sponsor you to implement its opportunity.
Description of the opportunity: "{desc}".
Message from provider: "{msg}".
The provider is ready to allocate up to {maxAmount}$.

Please, follow the link to register with ASA to contact with provider:

{inviteUrl}

Thanks!

notifyArtistsOpportunityInvite.msg:
